caller_intent: Luis Garcia Figueroa wants to add a new truck to his insurance policy, specifically a 2013 Ford F-250 pickup, under his commercial auto policy with National General. He needs liability coverage and is seeking clarification on costs and next steps.
resolution_steps: Agent Nadia confirms the policy details and verifies the truck's VIN (provided by Luis).
Identifies the vehicle as a 2013 Ford F-250 pickup and confirms it's for commercial use.
Asks about coverage type (liability only) and confirms no lien on the vehicle.
Calculates the cost for adding the truck: $246.70 for six months until June 17th.
Requests Luis to provide proof of insurance to a specified email address (Craig).
knowledge_required: Insurance policy management (adding vehicles to commercial auto policies)
Understanding of VIN verification and vehicle classification
systems_referenced: National General commercial auto policy database
Email portal for proof of insurance submission
summary: Luis Garcia Figueroa contacted Alliance Insurance Services to add a 2013 Ford F-250 pickup to his commercial auto policy with National General. Agent Nadia verified the VIN, confirmed liability coverage, calculated the six-month cost of $246.70, and requested proof of insurance via email. The call concluded with Luis agreeing to the terms and next steps.
